msg: If context node is a DOM attribute, we need to get to its parent using getOwnerElement.

msg: Updated the XPath parser. Unprefixed elements that were referenced in the

author: morten
msg: Updated our iterators so that they can be initialized with an attribute node.
The behaviour is different depending on the nature of the iterator (an
attribute does not have siblings, but it has following/preceding nodes etc.).
PR:		bugzilla 2551 (not all tests are OK, but some are)

author: morten
msg: Made the preceding iterator reverse (as it should be) and cleaned up some
more code. Added some code to handle specific combinations of iterators.
